StructuredXMLResume.ExecutiveSummary: Senior Business Analyst with over 15 years of international, enterprise experience as a principal-level professional. Specializing in large-scale data modeling, content management, compliance analysis, business intelligence (BI), customer value analysis, and change management.

PositionHistory.Title: Solutions Architect
PositionHistory.Description:
Managed the design and distribution of analytics reporting throughout the business. Coordinated and delivered specialized fraud analytics for financial groups. Provided in-depth customer value analysis. Performed in-depth analyses and developed complex reports for many business concerns including campaign performance, acquisition costs, response rates, subscriber churn, lifetime value, customer profiles, programming package penetration, customer acquisition quality and quantity.
Skills: Cognos, Oracle, Teradata, Business Intelligence, Business Analysis/Requirements Management, Relational Database Design, Customer Relationship Management (CRM), Vendor Management, Team Building and Project management, DataWarehousing, Risk Management

PositionHistory.Title: BI Solutions Architect
Business Analyst
PositionHistory.Description:
Re-skilled BA team for localization of ERP system. Coordinated and facilitated requirements gathering with overseas partners. Redesigned monthly reporting process to include TQM feedback principles and continuous auditing. Designed and built a centralized operations and management COGNOS reporting EDW with dashboards. Developed documentation and bespoke templates for standardized object models, sequence diagrams, and use case models.
Skills: Business Intelligence, CRM Auditing, Oracle, Customer Relationship Management, OBIEE/Seibel, Teradata, OOAD, Business Analysis/Requirements Management, Cognos, Negotiation, Relational Database Design, DataWarehousing, UML Modeling, Agile Development, Staff Development
Alex Spears - alexspears@fastmail.fm - Los Angeles · 323-806-8051

BI Solution Architect
PositionHistory.Description:
Created a bespoke project framework incorporating ISO, eTom & ITIL with an integrated quality management and performance reporting system. Coordinated and integrated overall data management, business intelligence and management reporting strategy and plan. Managed overseas Oracle developer team all data management systems. Alex Spears alexspears@fastmail.fm
Los Angeles · 323-806-8051 Summary Senior Business Analyst with over 15 years of international, enterprise experience as a principal-level professional. Specializing in large-scale data modeling, content management, compliance analysis, business intelligence (BI), customer value analysis, and change management.
Career Highlights * Process and Systems Specialist, designed enterprise data warehouse (EDW) and developed complete business intelligence strategy and program to integrate legacy OM/CRM into Oracle/Siebel implementation for multi-national telecommunications provider ; * As Performance Manager on a $1B+ state-wide public transport project, reduced penalty risk by 90% by negotiating and designing a comprehensive KPI model and reporting framework ; * As Compliance Analyst, translated compliance legislation into detailed business process appliances used for real-time analysis of 30+ financial services product lines, millions of customers and decades of history for retirement fund management provider

ExperienceSummary.ExecutiveBrief: Alex Spears has been working in the IT occupational sector for more than 11 years. Currently he is employed as a Solutions Architect at RSG Technology Management. Alex has extensive knowledge of Oracle, EDW, UML/OMT, Data Warehousing, Cognos Impromptu, Teradata, Relational Database, Oracle BI EE, Object Oriented Analysis/Design, Seibel, SDLC, Oracle Developer 2000, Negotiation, Fraud Analytics, CRM Auditing, Business Objects. Alex has an extensive management experience (4 years).
ExperienceSummary.ManagementRecord: Since 2005-11 for 19 months the candidate had experience at a lower grade management level working as a Performance Manager/Business Analyst at Victorian Transport. Since 2003-06 for 30 months the candidate had experience at a lower grade management level working as a Project Manager/Business Analyst at Synergy Consulting.
